评论详情: Decent material used and thick enough not to be see through. Very flattering fit.
Good quality fits well fabrics, OK

I had this skirt in black and pink before buying baby blue- I love these! They fit wonderfully, the colors don’t fade, they’re super comfy, soft and flowy. Sizing is true to size. The material itself is not see through, and cleans very well. Just don’t wear black underwear with the pastel colors unless you want to have your undies seen. Definitely will be buying in more colors!

I didn’t even open this. As soon as I saw the label I returned it. This is so sick and upsetting that a clothing product that causes cancer and reproductive harm would be sold here or anywhere. My mom has been battling stage 4 ovarian cancer this year and this is so upsetting to receive. Wtf. Giving one star instead of zero since there is a warning label on it.
Love wearing it with a white one piece. Got for my bday and glad I did. I’m tall 5’10 so it covers when walking but def don’t do bending over.
Can't wait to wear it to the concert I have planned to go to!

评论概述: This is such a cute dress! Love it!
评论详情: This dress is so cute and comfortable but has a drawback with the straps constantly falling down. It could easily be fixed with a quick stitch or two but I’m not that bothered by it to sew them. I love the dress and how thick it feels and how nice the quality is. I definitely would recommend this dress! This dress pairs nicely with some cute boots, tights and a bodysuit underneath. That’s how I styled it but there’s so many ways you could style this dress. Would definitely order in more colors. My wife’s jaw dropped when I put this on so I’ll say this dress is sexy enough too! Super cute! I'm 178 pounds, size large, size 12 and 5'2" and the large that I bought fit. I also got the brownish tan color and it’s definitely not brown. It’s like an autumn pumpkin orange color but still cute! Love it for fall!
I love this product, it was perfect for my concert! I will say however, it runs a little small so order a size or two up, other than that this is perfect!!

I am 5'5 and around 145 lbs. with a bit of a belly, and am a 36D I ordered a medium and though it was a little tight I was able to comfortably fit due to the stretchiness of the straps. It is a little short however, and I would definitely recommend wearing some kind of stockings or shorts underneath to avoid flashing people. Overall I am definitely satisfied for what I paid for, the material and stitching is good, it's not at all sheer, it accentuates my figure and ultimately does give my chest a little bit of a lift. If you are my size and like it tighter, I recommend a medium as it stretches well, but ultimately if you like just a little bit more room try the next size up.
It looked great! The size was right and so where the colors. The fabric is soooo soft too!!! The straps are elastic and stretch easily and it fits perfectly!!
